name: Stuck in a Day
description:
Stuck in a Day is a game where the goal is to spend the most time in an infinite life routine. It consists of mini-games that varies between three times of the day: Morning, afternoon and evening. The player will venture into a cartoonish world trying not to saturate his lifestyle.

Only with the mouse.

Graphics made by : Juliette Guillaumel

Game design by : Tom Becker and Thomas Monnerie

Programming by : Lucas Esposito, Jules Fritz and Franci Algera

IIM student project
